title: Immersion Ice Nucleation of Atmospherically Relevant Lipid Particles

Ice nucleating particles (INPs) play a crucial role in freezing water droplets by acting as heterogeneous ice nuclei, influencing cloud phase state and climate dynamics. INPs from marine aerosol particles...
